B-trust Framework

B-trust framework, based upon the paper "B-trust: Bayesian Trust Framework for Pervasive Computing" by Daniele Quercia, Stephen Hailes, Licia Capra.

See:
          Description

Packages
tests.trust B-trust framework tests.
tests.trust.model.exceptions Framework excaptions tests.
tests.trust.model.math Math utility class tests.
tests.trust.model.primitives Primitives tests.
tests.trust.model.sets Reputation data structure tests.
trust.model Trust model framework implementations.
trust.model.exceptions Exceptions generated by the framework.
trust.model.math Math utility classes.
trust.model.primitives Framework primitives: Peers and Contexts.
trust.model.sets Reputation data structure implementations.

 

B-trust framework, based upon the paper "B-trust: Bayesian Trust Framework for Pervasive Computing" by Daniele Quercia, Stephen Hailes, Licia Capra. Accessible here [pdf]
